content.query:
create MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'jpmia#2188';

create DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL synapse_sas_exp WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = 'sv=2022-11-02&ss=b&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacyx&se=2024-04-05T03:07:27Z&st=2024-03-21T19:07:27Z&spr=https&sig=%2Bx9j0JqIwONzh0tUqpNhLLy0enka7RB%2F3SA%2BtRTCnjc%3D';

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE synapse_exported_data
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://adlsjpmia.blob.core.windows.net/jpmia-synapse/synapse/workspaces/jpmia-synapse-analytics/exported_data_serverless',
    CREDENTIAL = synapse_sas_exp
);

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT uv_delta_format
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec' -- Optional: specify compression codec
);

create SCHEMA jpmia_ext;

-- Step 3: Create external table in Dedicated SQL pool
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE jpmia_ext.exportedCompanyDetail
(
    company_id BIGINT,
    name NVARCHAR(200),
    description NVARCHAR(3000),
    company_size int,
    formatted_company_size NVARCHAR(100),
    state NVARCHAR(100),
    country NVARCHAR(100),
    city NVARCHAR(1000),
    zip_code NVARCHAR(100),
    address NVARCHAR(3000),
    url NVARCHAR(1000),
    industries NVARCHAR(3000),
    specialities NVARCHAR(3000),
    number_of_employees BIGINT,
    number_of_followers BIGINT
)
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'exportedCompanyDetail',
    DATA_SOURCE = synapse_exported_data,
    FILE_FORMAT = uv_delta_format
);

-- Step 4: Insert data into target table
INSERT INTO jpmia.CompanyDetail
SELECT *
FROM jpmia_ext.exportedCompanyDetail;

select * from jpmia.CompanyDetail;
